While inside a Nydus Worm, Zagara regenerates 9.75% Health and Mana per second.

StimPack.description: After using Run and Gun, gain 20.00% Attack Speed and 20.00% Movement Speed for 3 seconds

StoneWolves.description: Increases the duration of Feral Spirit's root from 1 second to 1.5 seconds.

Stoneform.description: Activate to heal for 40% of your maximum Health over 10 seconds. Second Wind is disabled during this time.

Stoneskin.description: Activate to gain 30% of your maximum Health as a Shield for 5 seconds.

StormFront.description: Increases the cast range of Blizzard by 100%.

StormofVengeance.description: Increases the number of Shadow Beast waves to 4.

StormShield.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

StormEarthFire.tier: 4  Split into three elemental spirits for 15.15 seconds, each with 50% of your maximum Health, and enables two new leaping attacks for use.
StormEarthFire.description: Storm attacks at range for 61.36 (+4% per level) damage. Earth attacks slowly for 38.48 (+4% per level) damage and slows enemies by 25%. Fire attacks quickly for 17.68 (+4% per level) damage.

Stormcaller.description: When Lightning Shield damages an enemy Hero it restores 4 Mana, up to 40.

Strafe.description: Rapidly attack nearby visible enemies for 70.72 (+4% per level) damage per hit, prioritizing heroes over minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4 seconds.

Subdue.description: Increases Punish's slow to 80% decaying over 3 seconds.

SummonSindragosa.tier: 4  Deals 239.2 (+4% per level) damage and slows enemies by 60% for 3.5 seconds.
SummonSindragosa.description: Also disables non-Heroic enemies and Structures for 20 seconds.

SummonUltralisk.description: Summon an Ultralisk that attacks the target to deal 104 (+4% per level) damage. Attacks splash to nearby enemies for 50% damage. Can reactivate the Ability to retarget the Ultralisk. Lasts for 20 seconds.

SummonWaterElemental.tier: 4  Summons a Water Elemental at target location. The Water Elemental's Basic Attacks do 81.12 (+4% per level) damage, splash for 25% damage and Chill. Can reactivate the Ability to retarget the Water Elemental.

SunKingsFury.description: Living Bombs that spread to enemy Heroes deal 30% more damage.

Sundering.description: After a short delay, sunder the earth in a long line, dealing 284.96 (+4% per level) damage and shoving enemies to the side, stunning them for 1.25 seconds.

SunfireEnchantment.description: Activating Verdant Spheres causes your next Basic Attack to instead shoot a spell dealing 171.6 (+4% per level) damage.

SuperiorSchematics.description: Increase Rock-It! Turrets damage by 25% when you are within their attack range.

SuppressionPulse.description: Fire a large area pulse from the Spear of Adun, dealing 118.56 (+4% per level) damage and Blinding enemies for 4 seconds. Unlimited range.

SurgeofStamina.description: After using Surging Fist, the duration of stuns, slows, roots, and polymorphs applied to you are reduced by 50% for 5 seconds.

SurgingDash.description: Increases Surging Fist range and speed by 50%.

SurgingWinds.description: Gain 5% Ability Power for 8 seconds for every enemy hit by Blinding Wind. Additional enemies hit refresh the duration of this buff and further increase Ability Power. Stacks up to 4 times.

SurvivalInstincts.description: Increases Locust's Health by 50% and duration by 40%.

SustainedAnomaly.description: The Singularity Spike explodes for area damage and slows, regardless if it hits a target or not.

SustainedCarapace.description: Increases the Shield amount of Symbiote's Carapace by 40% and allows it to persist after Symbiote ends.

SwiftPursuit.description: Increases your Movement Speed by 20% while in a bush and 2 seconds after leaving.

SwiftReflexes.description: Every 4 seconds Chen can dodge an enemy Hero's Basic Attack, preventing all of its damage.

SwiftRetribution.description: Increases Smite's Movement Speed by 10% and duration by 1 second.

SwiftSweep.description: Increases the cast speed of Sacred Sweep by 50%.

Symbiosis.description: Every time Dark Swarm damages an enemy Hero, reduce its cooldown by 0.5 seconds.

SymbioticArmor.description: Anub'arak's Beetles are also granted a Shield equal to 270.40 (+4% per level).

SystemShock.description: Displacement Grenade slows enemies by 50% for 4 seconds. The slow amount decays over its duration.

TacticalEspionage.description: While Cloaked, Nova gains 4 Mana per second.

TakingFlight.description: Increases Spirit Swoop's range by 20%. If Spirit Swoop hits an enemy Hero, the Mana cost is refunded.

TalRashasElements.tier: 7  Using Abilities grants 5% Ability Power, to a maximum of 20%.
TalRashasElements.description: This bonus is reset when the same Ability is used within a chain.

TargetPurified.description: If the target of Purifier Beam dies, it automatically recasts on the nearest visible enemy Hero.

TasteforBlood.description: Quest: Enemies that die within 1 second of being hit by Globe of Annihilation increase its damage by 2, up to 500.

TazerRounds.description: Increases the duration of Pinning Shot's slow to 4 seconds.

TemperedbyDiscipline.description: Gain up to 10 stacks of Discipline after Hatred stacks are maxed. Basic Attacks heal for 3% of damage dealt to the primary target per Discipline stack.

TempestFury.description: The final strike of Windfury hits 3 times for 75% normal damage.

TemplarsZeal.description: Blade Dash cooldown recharges 100% faster while you are below 50% Health.

TemporalFlux.description: Disintegrate gradually slows enemies caught in its beam, to a maximum of 60%.

TemporalLoop.description: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they will teleport back to the location where you cast Temporal Loop on them.

TenaciousRoots.description: Entangling Roots grows 25% larger, lasts 25% longer, and roots targets for 0.5 seconds longer.

Tenderizer.description: Basic Attacks slow enemy Movement Speed by 25% for 1.5 seconds.

ThatstheStuff.description: Minigun heals you for 100% of the bonus damage it deals to Heroes.

TheBiggerTheyAre.description: Increases Minigun damage bonus to 4% while enemy Heroes are above 40% Health, but Minigun no longer has any effect on targets below 40%.

TheCrusadeMarchesOn.description: Basic and Heroic Abilities lower the cooldown of Iron Skin by 1.5 seconds.

TheGoodStuff.description: Healing Brew heals for an additional 62.4 (+4% per level) Health over 6 seconds.

TheHunt.description: Charge to target unit, dealing 261.04 (+4% per level) damage on impact and stunning for 1 second.

TheMastersTouch.description: Quest: Hit 30 enemy Heroes with Arcane Rift without dying. Reward: Permanently increases the damage dealt by 75 and cooldown reduction for hitting a Hero by 1 second.

TheNetherCalls.description: Increases Twisting Nether's slow by 10% and damage by 10% for every second channeled, to a maximum of 40% increase.

TheSequel.description: Reduces the Lost Vikings' death timer by 50%.

TheWillOfGall.tier: 7  Gall can activate Will of Gall to make you Unstoppable for 2 seconds.

ThickSkin.description: Using Darkflight reduces the damage taken from the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks by 50% while a Worgen.

ThingoftheDeep.description: Increases the range of your Basic Abilities by 25%.

ThirdWind.description: Increases Health Restoration rate to 80.08 (+4% per level) per second, and raises Health threshold to 60% Health for improved 159.12 (+4% per level) per second Restoration.

ThirstingBlade.description: Betrayer's Thirst's healing from Basic Attacks is increased from 30% to 50% while Sweeping Strike's damage bonus is active.

ThornwoodVine.description: Send forth vines that deal 170.56 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line. Can hold 3 charges.

ThrillofBattle.description: Activate to double the cooldown reduction from Basic Attacks for 8 seconds.

ThrilloftheHunt.description: Your Basic Attacks increase both you and Misha's Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.

ThrowingAxes.description: Increases your Basic Attack range by 25%.

ThunderBurn.description: Thunder Clap leaves a zone on the ground that explodes after 2 seconds dealing 49.92 (+4% per level) damage and applying a 25% slow for 2.5 seconds.

ThunderStrike.description: Thunder Clap deals 300% damage if only one target is hit.

Thunderstrikes.description: Lightning Rod deals 20% more damage each subsequent strike.

TidalWaves.description: Reduces Chain Heal's cooldown by 1 second for each Hero healed.

TimeOut.description: Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for up to 7 seconds. Can be reactivated to end the effect early.

TimelessCreature.description: Increases the duration of Cloud Serpent by 50%.

TimelostWisp.description: Wisp costs no Mana and its cooldown recharges 125% faster while no Wisp is active.

TimewalkersPursuit.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your Mana Regeneration by 0.102, up to 1.523. Reward: After gathering 15 Globes you also gain 5% Ability Power.

TissueRegeneration.description: Quest: Each time you collect 50 Essence, permanently increase your Health Regeneration by 5, up to 50.

TitanGrenade.description: Frag Grenade deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 5% of their maximum Health.

TitanKiller.description: Twin Blades attacks against Heroes deal an additional 2.5% of the target's maximum Health in damage.

ToadAffinity.description: Plague of Toads restores 5 Mana and reduces its cooldown by 1 second for each enemy hit.

ToadsofHugeness.description: Plague of Toads damage and area is increased by 20% after each hop.

ToothandClaw.description: Worgen Basic Attacks cleave for 100% damage.

Torrasque.description: The Ultralisk morphs into an egg when it dies. If the egg isn't killed within 4 seconds, a new Ultralisk is born.

TotalRecall.description: Recall's cooldown is increased by 8 seconds, but it heals you equal to the amount of Health you lost during that time.

TotemicProjection.description: Reactivate Earthbind Totem to move an existing totem to a new location once.

TourBus.description: Mosh Pit refreshes the cooldown of Powerslide. You can Powerslide during Mosh Pit, which also increases its duration by 2 seconds.

ToxicGas.description: Increases Vile Gas' radius by 25% and its damage by 50%.

TracerRounds.description: Your Basic Attacks reveal enemies for 4 seconds.

TragOulsEssence.description: Gain 8 Mana when you raise a Skeletal Warrior.

TrailofFrost.description: Increases Howling Blast's range by 30% and causes it to also root enemies between you and the target for 1.25 seconds.

Tranquility.description: Heals 83.2 (+4% per level) Health per second to nearby allied Heroes over 10 seconds.

Transcendence.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack heals the lowest nearby allied Hero for 75.92 (+4% per level).

Transfusion.tier: 7  Increases the duration of Stim Drone by 2 seconds.
Transfusion.description: You also gain the effect of Stim Drone when cast on an ally.

TraumaTrigger.description: You gain an untalented Safeguard automatically if you take damage while below 50% Health. This effect has a 20 second cooldown.

TriOptimal.description: The cooldown of Verdant Spheres is refreshed by 2 seconds per target hit with Gravity Lapse.

TripleStrike.description: Increases Twin Blades's number of Basic Attacks to 3, but increase its cooldown by 1 second.

TripleTap.description: Locks in on the target Hero, then fires 3 shots that hit the first Hero or Structure they come in contact with for 351.52 (+4% per level) damage each.

Triumvirate.description: If Arcane Orb hits an enemy Hero after traveling at least 65% of its base range, the cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

TrueshotAura.description: You passively grant 15% Basic Attack damage to nearby allied Heroes.

Tufferfish.description: Pufferfish take an additional attack before being disarmed.

Tumble.description: Vault gains an additional charge, allowing it to be cast twice in quick succession.

TumorClutch.description: Creep Tumor Mana cost removed. Cooldown decreased to10 seconds.

TurretStorage.description: Increases Rock-It! Turret maximum charges from 2 to 3.

TwilightArchon.description: Increases Archon's initial Shield and Attack Damage by 50%, and increases Basic Attack range in Archon form by 35%.

TwilightDream.description: After a short delay, deal 388.96 (+4% per level) damage in a large area around you, silencing enemies making them unable to use Abilities for 3 seconds. Also passively increases your Mana Regeneration by 1.5.

TwilightNova.description: After the first bounce, 2 extra bombs bounce to the sides once.

TwilightVeil.description: Consuming Blaze reduces damage taken from Abilities by 50% for 2 seconds per enemy Hero hit.

TwinSpheres.description: Verdant Spheres gains a second charge.

TwistingNether.description: After 1 second, nearby enemies are slowed by 50% while you channel, up to 5 seconds. Activate to deal 435.75 (+5% per level) damage.

TwoForOne.description: Increases the number of allies healed by Healing Brew to 2, but increases the cooldown by 1.5 seconds.

TyrantMaw.description: Devouring Maw deals 50% more damage and when you get a Takedown reduce its cooldown by 25 seconds.

UltimateEvolution.description: Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Ability Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.

Unbound.description: Allows Sweeping Strike to go over walls and terrain. If Sweeping Strike doesn't hit any enemies, the cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds.

Underking.description: Increases Burrow Charge range by 20% and damage by 100%.

UnendingHatred.description: Quest: Every Minion you kill gives you 0.1 Attack Damage. Every Takedown gives 1 Attack Damage. Reward: Once you reach 20 Attack Damage, receive an additional 10 Attack damage.

UnfairAdvantage.description: Nature's Toxin deals 50% more damage to Heroes that are slowed.

UnfetteredAssault.description: Increases Razor Swipe's lunge distance by 60%.

UnleashtheBoars.description: Release a herd of boars that track down all enemy Heroes in a direction, dealing 114.4 (+4% per level) damage, revealing, and slowing enemies by 40% for 5 seconds.

Unleashed.description: If the free cast of Go for the Throat kills its target, another free cast is provided that deals 35% more damage, up to 140%.

UnrelentingPursuit.description: Reduces the cooldown of Ruthless Onslaught by 33.333% upon impact.

UnstableAnomaly.description: When Polymorph ends, deal 118.56 (+4% per level) damage to the target and all nearby enemies.

UnstablePoison.tier: 3  Minions that die under the effects of Black Arrows explode, dealing 120.64 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.
UnstablePoison.description: Does not damage Heroes or Structures.

UnstoppableForce.description: Increases the duration of Avatar by 30%, and the duration of Disables are reduced by 75% while in Avatar.

UntappedPotential.description: Increases duration by 2 seconds. Additionally, gain an extra 5% Movement Speed whenever an enemy is hit, up to 100%.

Untouchable.description: Quest: Takedowns increase your Basic Attack damage by 2%, up to 30%. These bonuses are lost on death.

UnyieldingDespair.description: Every second Drain Hope is active, its cooldown is reduced by 1 second.

Updraft.description: Increases Barrel Roll's range and Shield amount by 40%.

UpgradedBallistics.description: Displacement Grenade travels 50% faster and enemies directly impacted take 33% more damage.

Upheaval.description: After 1 second pull enemies towards your direction, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds and dealing 104 (+4% per level) damage.

UrticatingSpines.description: Casting Harden Carapace will also deal 83.2 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. Deals double damage against Heroes.

VampiricAssault.description: Basic Attacks heal for 15.00% of the damage dealt to the primary target.

VampiricStrike.description: Basic Attacks heal for 25.00% of the damage dealt to the primary target.

Vengeance.description: Strafe also fires penetrating bolts in a line for 35.36 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds.

VengefulRoots.description: Entangling Roots also spawns a Treant that does 66.56 (+4% per level) damage per second and lasts 10 seconds.

VentralSacs.description: (PH) Infested Drop spawns 3 Roachlings and they take 25% reduced damage from non-Heroes.

Versatile.description: Increases the Mana return of Innervate to 30%.

Viciousness.description: Increases Inner Beast's duration to 4 seconds, and causes Ability damage to also refresh its duration.

Victuals.description: Heal for 3% of your Maximum Health when you collect Fresh Meat. Meat continues to drop at maximum stacks.

VigorousAssault.description: Basic Attacks heal for 15% of the damage dealt to the primary target.

VigorousStrike.description: Basic Attacks heal for 25% of the damage dealt to the primary target.

VikingBribery.tier: 1  Kill enemy Minions to gain stacks of Bribe.  Use 40 stacks to bribe target Mercenary, instantly defeating them.

VikingFuryoftheStorm.tier: 7  Every 5 seconds, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 42.64 (+4% per level) damage to the target, and 109.2 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby Minions and Mercenaries.
VikingFuryoftheStorm.description: Each Viking has their own cooldown.

VileCleaver.description: Basic Attacks create a cloud of Vile Gas on the target.

VileNest.description: Toxic Nests slow enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2.5 seconds.

VisceralAttacks.description: Worgen Basic Attacks reduce Razor Swipe's cooldown by 1 second.

ViscousAcid.description: Banelings slow enemies by 20% for 1.5 seconds.

VoidPrison.description: Slows time in an area to a near standstill, making allies and enemies invulnerable and unable to act for 5 seconds. You are not affected.

VoidSlash.description: Cleave deals 30% increased damage if used from Cloak or within 1 second of being Cloaked.

VolatileAcid.description: Banelings can travel 50% further before exploding and their damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Structures is increased by 50%.

VolatileMutation.description: Ultimate Evolution clones and Monstrosities deal 142.48 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies every 3 seconds and when they die.

VorpalBlade.description: Activate to teleport to the last non-structure target you attacked within 3 seconds.

WailingArrow.description: Shoot an arrow that can be reactivated to deal 237.12 (+4% per level) damage and silence enemies in an area making them unable to use Abilities for 2.5 seconds. The arrow detonates automatically when it reaches maximum range.

WanderingKeg.description: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel, dealing 61.36 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.

WarPaint.description: Basic Attacks heal you for 30% of the damage dealt.

WarpSickness.description: Phase Prism also slows the enemy's Movement Speed by 35% for 4 seconds.

WaterDragon.description: Summon a Water Dragon that after a delay hits the nearest enemy Hero and all enemies near them, dealing 330.72 (+4% per level) damage and slowing their Movement Speed by 70% for 4 seconds.

WaveOfForce.description: Knock away all enemies from an area and deal 168 (+5% per level) damage.

WaveofLight.description: Each Hero healed by Holy Radiance returns 8 Mana and reduces the cooldown by 1 second, up to a maximum of 40 Mana and 5 seconds.

WayoftheHundredFists.description: Radiant Dashing to an enemy causes you to launch a volley of blows dealing 255.84 (+4% per level) total damage instead of a Basic Attack.

Weaken.description: Increases Cursed Strikes Attack Speed slow from 40% to 75%.

WhirlingDervish.description: Reduces the duration of stuns, slows, and roots against your Hero while Dark Swarm is active by 50%.

WildVigor.description: Using Crippling Spores increases the damage of your next 4 Basic Attacks by 50%.

WildfireBear.description: Misha deals 29.12 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

WillofHeaven.description: Allies with Bestow Hope gain 20% Attack Speed.

WilloftheForsaken.description: Activate to become Unstoppable and gain 30% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

WillingVessel.description: Increases the healing from Drain Hope to 30% of your maximum Health and Drain Essence to 15% of your maximum Health.

WindShear.description: Reduces the cooldown of Windfury by 4 seconds.

WindTunnel.description: Mighty Gust creates a wind tunnel for 4 seconds. Enemies caught in the tunnel will periodically be pushed back.

Windrunner.description: Teleporting with Haunting Wave fully recharges your Withering Fire. Haunting Wave can be cast a second time for free within 5 seconds after teleporting.

WindsofCelerity.description: Increases Raven Form's Movement Speed bonus by 50%.

WintersReach.description: Increases the range of Frostbolt by 30%.

Wintermute.description: Increases the cast range of Water Elemental by 50%, and the Water Elemental will now mimic your Basic Abilities for 50% damage.

WitheringBarrage.description: Increase Withering Fire charges by 1. Charges can be fired 33% faster.

WizenedDuelist.description: Quest: Hero takedowns increase Basic Attack damage by 3%, up to 30%. This bonus is lost on death.

WolfRun.description: Increases the Movement Speed of Ghost Wolf from 30% to 40%.

Wolfheart.description: While Inner Beast is active, each Basic Attack lowers its cooldown by 0.8 seconds.

Wormhole.description: For 2 seconds, you can activate Blink again to return to the point where it was cast from.

WrathofCod.description: Increase Pufferfish's damage by 35% against Slimed targets.

WrathofHeaven.description: Allies with Bestow Hope gain 10% Ability Power.

WrathoftheBerserker.description: Increase damage dealt by 40%. Reduce the duration of stuns, slows, and roots against you by 50%. Lasts 15 seconds, and extends by 1 second for every 10 Fury gained.

XTraLargeBombs.description: Increases Xplodium Charge range and radius by 30%.

ZealotCharge.description: Increase Twin Blades' charge distance by 100%.

Zealotry.description: Increases the duration of Righteousness by 50%, and reduces its cooldown by 2 seconds.

ZeisVengeance.description: Arcane Orb does an additional 25% more damage to enemies far away.
